name: Shape Stacker (~ Oceane Peretti ~)
description:
This is my first mobile game that I'm publishing on itch.io!

Feel free to download it & leave comments !

Thank you to anyone who will take the time to play!

The game is free to play so  if you liked you can check my Tipee if you want to support me !

https://fr.tipeee.com/foodies 

Thank you
